text:
Strong message from @mophofficial & @MoEAfghanistan today. They joined forces w/@UNICEFAfg, @WHOAfghanistan & @gavi to vaccinate #TEACHERS w/the #COVAX #COVID19 #vaccine  so #schools can reopen & #children can #learn safely. @UNICEFEducation @UNICEFROSA 
#ForEveryChild education https://t.co/HDfcU5AwXT
